rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Vastu-aligned placement to welcome positive energy.
Luxurious living room with a central location near the courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
Cozy dining area adjacent to the kitchen for convenience.
Spacious master bedroom with a balcony offering views of the garden and courtyard.
Well-appointed guest bedroom featuring a private balcony.
Comfortable guest room with balcony access to the garden.

rooms.description: Multipurpose room designed for family activities and remote work.

openings.description: Sturdy staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Spacious area for storage or recreational activities.
